name: Peanut Butter Cookies (Grain Free)
author: rebe
summary: These rich peanut butter cookies made without refined sugars or grains are very popular with my gluten-free kids! Also delicious as a sandwich cookie with fudgy chocolate frosting in between.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Mix peanut butter, 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons honey, eggs, coconut flour, vanilla extract, and baking soda together in a large bowl until cookie dough is well-combined
Drop teaspoonfuls of cookie dough onto ungreased baking sheets, spacing them about 2 inches apart
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 15 minutes
Use a fork to press a crisscross pattern into cookies immediately after removing from the oven
